events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it does not fit me at all.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product and getting money back.
Your request has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you shortly with the return process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I’m here to help you with your refund and return.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached, and I haven’t worn it yet.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label so you can send the jacket back for a full refund.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick help and clear instructions on how to return the item.
Your refund request has been successfully processed, and you should receive your money back within 5-7 business days after return.
We wanted to check in and make sure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was completed successfully and there are no further issues, we are closing this case now. Thank you for choosing us.
